meanings.sent1: She enjoys reselling her old clothes online.
meanings.sent2: He is reselling his collection of comic books.
meanings.sent3: The idea of reselling used furniture seemed like a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: Reselling memories is like trying to catch a fleeting butterfly.
meanings.sent5: Reselling can give new life to forgotten items.

meanings.definition: The action of selling something again.
meanings.sent1: The reselling of concert tickets is against the rules.
meanings.sent2: He made a profit from the reselling of vintage toys.
meanings.sent3: The reselling of homemade cookies at the bake sale raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: In the world of reselling, one person's trash is another's treasure.
meanings.sent5: The reselling market is always changing and evolving.
